plot: A young man finds himself being called to feminine for what he likes. One day he wakes up and bam! He got the biggest surprise of his life. He finds himself getting advice from a doctor who guides him for the next 28 days.
title: Little Bitch
plot_es: A young man finds himself being called to feminine for what he likes. One day he wakes up and bam! He got the biggest surprise of his life. He finds himself getting advice from a doctor who guides him for the next 28 days.
plot_en: A young man finds himself being called to feminine for what he likes. One day he wakes up and bam! He got the biggest surprise of his life. He finds himself getting advice from a doctor who guides him for the next 28 days.
